original_text: I make a path for the storms to travel along. I tell the thunder and the strong rain which way to go. I make a path for the storms to travel along. I tell the thunder and the strong rain which way to go. I make a path for the storms to travel along. I tell the thunder and the strong rain which way to go. I make a path for the storms to travel along.
korean_text: 누가 홍수를 위하여 물길을 터 주었으며 우레와 번개 길을 내어 주었느냐

sentences.original_text: I make a path for the storms to travel along
I tell the thunder and the strong rain which way to go
sentences.korean_translation: 나는 천둥과 비에 어디로 가야 할지 알려준다
